Topic.Title: How do you categorize your game as a "work in progress"?

Posts.EditableText: When I saw the 'work in progress' category on the category list, I thought it would be a good idea to publish my game as one of these. But I can't figure out how! Is it just that you categorize it as a work in progress if someone publishes an unfinished game?
Posts.HTML: When I saw the 'work in progress' category on the category list, I thought it would be a good idea to publish my game as one of these. But I can't figure out how! Is it just that you categorize it as a work in progress if someone publishes an unfinished game?

Posts.EditableText:
I'm also working on a "work in progress" type of game. Best thing to do is categorize it then mention that the project is continuously updating. If you mark it as a work of progress, I don't think it shows up for people to play. 

Anonynn
Posts.HTML:
I'm also working on a "work in progress" type of game. Best thing to do is categorize it then mention that the project is continuously updating. If you mark it as a work of progress, I don't think it shows up for people to play.

Anonynn

Posts.EditableText: I guess I didn't think of starting to publish my game. I think I'll probably go with your idea, Anonynn. Thanks for the help.
Posts.HTML: I guess I didn't think of starting to publish my game. I think I'll probably go with your idea, Anonynn. Thanks for the help.
